titleStmt.title: Spectators, make a ring, that you may see the fatal battle which is like to be fought by two pow'rfull combatants
titleStmt.author: Lichtenberger, Johannes, 15th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Henry Brome at the Gun in Ivy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Title from first three lines of text.
Verse: "Spectators, make a ring, that you may see ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
